column4: Ubuntu-10.04..on sda1...I have a file that is on sda1 and also on sdb5...when I mount sdb5 and try to open file from /opt/filename it open file from sda1
is the file on sdb5 a symlink?
no both files are seperate but also both under /opt...The file name is Moneydance one is a .deb the other is a rpm
